subject: Speed Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: The American Shani Davis reclaimed the world record in the 1,500 meters in a World Cup meet at the Utah Olympic Oval. Davis finished in 1 minute 41.80 seconds to beat the previous record of 1:42.01 set by Canada’s Denny Morrison last March. shani.
snippet: The American Shani Davis reclaimed the world record in the 1,500 meters in a World Cup meet at the Utah Olympic Oval. Davis finished in 1 minute 41.80 seconds to beat the previous record of 1:42.01 set by Canada’s Denny Morrison last March. shani.
